product_name: The North Face GTD Sleeveless T-Shirt - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The North Face GTD sleeveless T-shirt keeps you cool during runs and workouts in hot weather thanks to moisture-wicking FlashDry(TM) fibers. FlashDry(TM) fabric additive dramatically improves drying time and breathability without adding weight or bulk or washing out. Polyester wicks away sweat; natural particles in fabric resist odors. Ventilation panels at the shoulders and sides, down the back and under the arms promote cooling airflow. Reflective logos on The North Face GTD sleeveless T-shirt help keep you visible; fabric offers a UV-protective rating of UPF 50+. Closeout.
short_description: The North Face GTD sleeveless T-shirt keeps you cool during runs and workouts in hot weather thanks to moisture-wicking FlashDry(TM) fibers.
